subject: Thank you for your application, we accepted your appication
body:
Your credit report does not matter to us!
If your family OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this offer will expire THIS EVENING:
$333,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this simplified form... 
Do not worry about approval, your Your credit report will not disqualify you!
